string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q2
string-array.item: 2. The ___ you have, the more you want.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q3
string-array.item: 3. ___ the dog for a walk yet?
Present Perfect or Present Perfect Continuous

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q4
string-array.item: 4. A: “I’ve never seen anything like this before.” \n B: “Neither ___ I.”

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q5
string-array.item: 5. ___ are known for their outgoing personalities, generosity and sense of humor.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q6
string-array.item: 6. Do you like my ___ new shoes?

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q7
string-array.item: 7. I like my uncles. They are ___ nice people.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q9
string-array.item: 9. When we arrive in Los Angeles we\'ll need to rest, because we ___ about 800 miles.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q10
string-array.item: 10. You must have your car serviced every year or every 10.000 km, ____ happens first.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q11
string-array.item: 11. We should get ___ before we can launch the new product.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q12
string-array.item: 12. The company is said ___ more than 100 million dollars only last month.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q13
string-array.item: 13. The new chemical ____ when it exploded.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q14
string-array.item: 14. I don\'t want to go out. I\'d rather ___ home.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q15
string-array.item: 15. I wish I ___ a better job. I don\’t enjoy this kind of work.
Wishes and regrets – I wish / if only

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q16
string-array.item: 16. When you arrive, we ___ in the garden.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q17
string-array.item: 17. If I were you, I ___ her that I love her.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q18
string-array.item: 18. The light in Scot’s room is on. He ___ computer games.

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q19
string-array.item: 19. ___ to be a lot of confusion and misinformation about the accident.
Distancing – expressions and passive of reporting verbs

string-array.name: exam_b2_n1_q20
string-array.item: 20. She didn\'t remember to take the rubbish out, and ___ .
